name: Halloween 2006: Romantic Royals Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who gave the Halloween party at the Lakeview?
questions.explanation:
Craig Montgomery.

	Craig threw the Halloween party at the Lakeview and sent dresses to the nurses of the hospital since many of them couldn't afford a costume. Craig had the theme of the party made romantic royals since the party was for the Prince and Princess of Leonia.

questions.text: When Katie first asked Mike what he would like to go as, he said Elvis. Mike and Katie attended the party as which couple?
questions.explanation:
Jane and Tarzan.

	Mike suggested that he could dress up as Elvis since Elvis was "the king" and Katie could go as Priscilla. However, the two of them came up with the idea of going as Tarzan and Jane.

questions.text: One of the greatest love stories in the world was 'Romeo and Juliet'. Which couple walked into the party dressed as this ill-fated couple?
questions.explanation:
Casey and Mattie.

	Casey and Mattie have had one of the greatest love stories on a soap opera. However, their love story was just as tragic as Romeo and Juliet's.

questions.text: Lucy came to the party as Cleopatra, but did Dusty play her Marc Anthony?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Dusty didn't dress up for the party, but he did attend. Lucy's doctor friend dressed up as Julius Caesar and picked her up at Holden and Lilly's house.

questions.text: Which one of the women came dressed as 'Madame X' from John Sargent's painting?
questions.explanation:
Barbara.

	Barbara came as 'Madame X' and carried her mask with 'Madame X's' face on it. Gwen opted to skip the party and hang out with Barbara in her room, but Barbara wanted them all to go to the party.

questions.text: Luke came with Lucinda, and he was decked out in costume as a very famous poet. Who was he portraying?
questions.explanation:
Lord Byron.

	Luke escorted Lucinda to the ball, but wanted to take Jade home after she showed up at the party and got reamed by the other younger party goers.

questions.text: Carly may have been without her prince at the ball, but she turned the heads of every person in the room. Who was Carly portraying?
questions.explanation:
Grace Kelly.

	In order to keep the Prince Adolfo away from Vienna, Carly dressed as his favorite person, Grace Kelly, to keep him attracted to her and away from Vienna. The plot worked and Simon was able to switch the real diamonds for fake diamonds.

questions.text: Emily may have been double crossing Craig during the party, but at least she kept her head, unlike the woman she was portraying?
questions.explanation:
Marie Antoinette.

	During the party, Emily was helping Dusty figure out what Craig's next plan was. She was dressed as Marie Antoinette and the fan she had with her had a picture of Marie Antoinette on it.

questions.text: Romeo and Juliet weren't the only Shakespearean couple at the party. Gwen was Ophelia, but who was Will portraying?
questions.explanation:
Hamlet.

	At first, Gwen looked as if she's dressed like Pocahontas, but during an interview Jennifer Landon said she was dressed to be Ophelia to Will's Hamlet.

questions.text: Last, but not least, was one of the greatest love triangles of all time. Meg Snyder was Guinevere, but who portrayed her husband, Arthur?
questions.explanation:
Craig.

	Craig hand-picked Meg's outfit for the ball so she could be Guinevere. Paul escorted her as Sir Lancelot and Craig played Guinevere's husband, Arthur.
